headline: Is There Now an Opportunity in Paramount Skydance After Potential Warner Bros. Bid?
summary: Trying to decide what to do with Paramount Skydance stock? You are not alone. After its wild ride lately, plenty of investors are scratching their heads, wondering whether it is time to jump in, sit back, or cash out. The last month alone has delivered a jolt, with shares surging 35.3%, a leap that would catch anyone’s attention. Looking back a full year, Paramount Skydance has notched a massive 85.3% return. Even year to date, the stock is up an impressive 78.8%. Clearly, something big is...
